content: the moose balaclava is a cozy and simple balaclava knitted up quickly it is for beginner knitters who are comfortable with knit stitches and purl stitches the balaclava is fitted but notice that the superwash merino has the tendency to stretch out a bit so the finished balaclava with get a bit wider with wear however if you prefer a more oversized balaclava you kan knit the bigger size sizing 54 58 58 61 cm after washing and blocking the finished balaclava measures 18 20 cm across when laying flat required techniques cast on knit stitch purl stitch backward loop cast on pick up and knit stitches italian tubular bind off yarn over knit two stitches together needles circular needles 5 mm us 8 / 60 cm 24 inches 5 mm us 8 / 40 cm 16 inches 4 5 mm us 7 / 40 cm 16 inches yarn 100 150 g drops merino extra fine mix held together with 50 50 g drops brushed alpaca silk uni colour
